Description: Green glazed composition overseer shabti of the God's Father of Amun, Bakenkhons, with black detail: a short wig tied with a fillet, an unmodelled face with traced eyes and one hand held to the chest with a whip; Hieroglyphic text down the apron and lower leg.
Curator's comments: The collection contains three other shabtis of the same man (EA 54839, 68605 and 68606). The collection also includes five shabtis in a different style of a God's Father and God's Servant of Amun, Bakkhons, who was probably a different individual (EA 50106, 50107, 71108, 71154 and 71156).
